subject: Re: Order #SSN6034 confirmed
description_text:
Hello,
I apologize. Can I cancel my order? I just realized this pedal is probably too much for my needs. 
Maybe in the future these will be what I go for. 

Thanks,-Brandon

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Brandon Webb,  I apologize for the delayed response.  We have confirmed that your order was shipped on the 13th, so we are unable to cancel it at this time.  http://t.17track.net/en#nums=887888140857
